content.question: The gravitational field <math alttext="g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>g</mi></math> of a spherically symmetric object of radius <math alttext="uppercase R sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> as a function of distance <math alttext="lowercase r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> from the objectâ€™s center is shown in the graph. choices.label: A spherical shell of non-negligible thickness
